Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000 for the product. This amount reflects its true worth while allowing us both to benefit from this exchange. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation of the product. Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful collaboration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
